mapper.update: update shop set shop_homepage = #{shop_homepage}, addr_bunzi = #{addr_bunzi}, shop_bh = #{shop_bh} where shop_no = #{shop_no}
mapper.select: select s1.product_no, p1.product_name from shop_product s1 inner join product p1 on s1.product_no = p1.product_no where s1.shop_no = #{shop_no} and s1.soldout_check = 0 order by p1.product_name
mapper.delete: delete from shop_product where product_no = #{prod_no} and shop_no = #{shop_no}
mapper.update: update shop_product set soldout_check = 1 where product_no = #{prod_no} and shop_no = #{shop_no}
mapper.select: select p.product_no, p.product_name from product p LEFT JOIN (select * from shop_product where shop_no = #{shop_no})sp on p.product_no = sp.product_no where sp.product_no is null order by p.product_name

select DISTINCT wishlist.product_no, p.product_name from wishlist LEFT JOIN (select * from shop_product where shop_no = #{shop_no})sp on wishlist.product_no = sp.product_no inner JOIN product p on wishlist.product_no = p.product_no where sp.product_no is null

select w.product_no, p.product_name, count(w.product_no) as countP from wishlist w inner join shop_product sp on w.product_no = sp.product_no inner join product p on w.product_no = p.product_no where sp.shop_no = #{shop_no} and sp.soldout_check = 0 group by w.product_no order by countP desc, p.product_name
select s1.product_no, p1.product_name from shop_product s1 inner join product p1 on s1.product_no = p1.product_no where s1.shop_no = #{shop_no} and s1.soldout_check = 1 order by p1.product_name
mapper.update: update shop_product set soldout_check = 0 where product_no = #{prod_no} and shop_no = #{shop_no}
mapper.select: select p.product_no, p.product_name from product p LEFT JOIN (select * from shop_product where shop_no = #{shop_no})sp on p.product_no = sp.product_no where sp.product_no is null and product_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') order by product_name;
